cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles SE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward, paralleling the New England coast and heading toward Nova Scotia/Newfoundland
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Nova Scotia, near or just southwest of Halifax

weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Woods Hole to Sagamore Beach MA, including Nantucket and Martha’s Vineyard; East of Bar Harbor to Eastport ME
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern Massachusetts, Cape Cod and Islands, far eastern Maine, Atlantic Canada coastline
weather_observation.wind: Brief period of tropical-storm-force gusts (40–50 mph) possible during the morning of 7 Sep
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal flooding possible at high tide; surge generally below 2 ft
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible, locally higher in bands
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along exposed beaches
